title: She Rides Shotgun
overview: Newly released from prison and marked for death by unrelenting enemies, Nate must now protect his estranged 11-year-old daughter, Polly, at all costs. With scant resources and no one to trust, Nate and Polly forge a bond under fire as he shows her how to fight and surviveâ€”and she teaches him the true meaning of unconditional love.
